## Setup

```{r setup}
library("tidyverse")
murders <- read_csv("data/murder_total_deaths.csv")
happiness <- read_csv("data/hapiscore_whr.csv")
population <- read_csv("data/pop.csv")
```

## Data Cleaning

Converting Murder counts to numeric
```{r}
murders_clean <- murders |> 
  # filter the columns
  select(country, `2005`:`2019`) |> 
  # pivot
  pivot_longer(cols = `2005`:`2019`,
               names_to = "years",
               values_to = "murder_count") |> 
  mutate(murder_count = if_else(
    str_detect(murder_count, "k"),
    as.numeric(str_remove(murder_count, "k")) * 1000,
    as.numeric(murder_count)
  ))
```
